## Part 2

-   [Build a story map about a scientific expedition to a Guatemalan volcano](https://learn.arcgis.com/en/projects/share-the-story-of-an-expedition/)\
    \
    [Story Map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/707ac75d45c1463fa71f968658408d63)\
    ![](images/Screenshot 2024-03-29 104616.png)\
    \
    **Insight: Web maps are super great if you need to share the resulting map across an organization. Storymaps are a great tool for final projects and reports for the public.\
    \
    New Tools:\
    **Story maps have a ton of new tools available, webmaps are very similar to the desktop but have a different layout and method for calling some analysis functions.
